2200064.text: Teleports into the void to avoid damage.

2200066.text: Dejase is able to absorb Chaos Energy and increase her Attack permanently.

2200068.text: Dejase focuses her energy and deals a huge amount of Magic DMG to the doll of the lowest Health.

2200070.text: The Thunder Dragon summons a Demonic Dragon into battle.

2200072.text: The Thunder Dragon paralyzes the dolls in the front row.

2200074.text: Fellagood summons the Winged Dire Wolf, Demonic Wingsnake and Killer Whale into battle in that order.

2200076.text: Twin Executors will attack dolls in the back row first.

2200078.text: At low Health, Twin Executors will use their Finality skill that incapacitates dolls, effectively taking them out of battle.

2200080.text: Solaris Dimas frequently summons young monsters into battle.

2200082.text: Solaris Dimas bleeds the front row dolls, stopping them from being healed for a period of time.

2200084.text: Solaris Dimas periodically reduces damage dealt by the dolls.

2200086.text: At low Health, Solaris Dimas fires beams from their eyes to attack dolls over time.

2200088.text: Eddine shines 3 times, each time dealing damage to the dolls. Shines can be disrupted by control skills.

2200090.text: Eddine splits into 3 young creatures, dealing damage to the front-row doll.

2200092.text: Eddine enters a dream, increasing damage dealt significantly.

2200094.text: At low Health, hides behind Nightmare Shield and prepares to evolve, which can be stopped by dealing damage.

2200096.text: Fear of Shadow evolves into Source of Fear and increases its ATK significantly.

2200098.text: At low Health, hides behind Nightmare Shield and prepares to evolve, which can be stopped by dealing damage.

2200100.text: Fear unleashes shadows that envelope the dolls, and hides into the shadows to avoid all damage.

2200102.text: Source of Fear can evolve into Despair of the Abyss and increase its ATK significantly.

2200104.text: Fear unleashes shadows that envelope the dolls, and hides into the shadows to avoid all damage.

2200106.text: Despair of the Abyss casts a shield and hides behind it to prepare for the outbreak. This can be disrupted by destroying the shield.

2200108.text: Unleashes all the dark energy to deal a large amount of damage.

2200110.text: Soluk increases his damage dealt every time he loses a certain amount of Health.

2200112.text: If the battle lasts too long, Soluk kills all dolls.

2200114.text: Soluk is able to deal Physical DMG or Magic DMG, depending on the way he attacks.

2200116.text: If there are less than 3 dolls of our allies present, then Soluk will keep attacking with his hammer.

2200118.text: Dolls will achieve victory when the battle lasts a certain amount of time.

2200120.text: Soluk is able to deal Physical DMG or Magic DMG, depending on the way he attacks.

2200122.text: If there are less than 3 dolls of our allies present, then Soluk will keep attacking with his hammer.

2200124.text: Dolls will achieve victory when the battle lasts a certain amount of time.

2200128.text: Soluk is able to deal Physical DMG or Magic DMG, depending on the way he attacks.

2200130.text: If there are less than 3 dolls of our allies present, then Soluk will keep attacking with his hammer.

2200132.text: Dolls will achieve victory when the battle lasts a certain amount of time.

2200136.text: If the battle lasts too long, Soluk kills all dolls.

2200138.text: If the battle lasts too long, Soluk kills all dolls.

2200140.text: Soluk periodically summons 3 orbs that stop the Order Energy from generating. Break an orb to obtain a large amount of Order Energy and Chaos Energy. The orbs self-destruct after staying unbroken for a period of time, dealing damage to all dolls.

2200142.text: If the battle lasts too long, Soluk kills all dolls.

2200144.text: Soluk periodically summons 3 orbs that stop the Order Energy from generating. Break an orb to obtain a large amount of Order Energy and Chaos Energy. The orbs self-destruct after staying unbroken for a period of time, dealing damage to all dolls.

2200146.text: Soluk increases his damage dealt every time he loses a certain amount of Health.

2200006.text: Able to unleash both magic and physical attacks.

2200008.text: The Dimension Overseer periodically immobilizes a doll, stopping it from taking actions.

2200010.text: At low Health, the Stone Golem will keep knocking off dolls.

2200012.text: The Phantom Mantis is good at physical attacks. She can become frenzy when Orchid Mantis dies first.

2200014.text: Able to heal and reduce Physical DEF.

2200016.text: At low Health, Flare deals damage over time to dolls.

2200018.text: Flare periodically puts a doll to sleep, stopping it from taking actions.

2200020.text: At low Health, Asherah will keep knocking off dolls.

2200022.text: Asherah periodically summons spores that unleashes poison on dolls after 10 seconds.

2200024.text: Anemone periodically ignites dolls, dealing damage over time.

2200026.text: A skill that deals very high damage.

2200030.text: At low Health, Hervoraltar will frantically attack dolls.

2200032.text: The Sentry Captain and his followers are adept at single-target attack.

2200034.text: The Sentry Captain summons his followers to help him in combat.

2200036.text: Reduces Physical DEF of front row dolls.

2200040.text: Cersivey freezes dolls, stopping them from taking actions.

2200042.text: At low Health, Cersivey summons a blizzard that attacks dolls over time.

2200044.text: Cersivey summons ice cores to protect herself and restore Health. Ice cores can be shattered during the spell.

2200048.text: Gigas Magmon's Trample immediately kills dolls below a certain Health.

2200050.text: The Crimson Maiden of War periodically stuns front row dolls.

2200052.text: At low Health, the Crimson Maiden of War becomes immune to all attacks for a short period of time.

2200054.text: Sinmara can summon a Magmon to assist in battle.

2200056.text: At low Health, Sinmara deals damage over time to dolls.

2200058.text: A skill that deals very high damage.

2200060.text: Attacks considerably more frequently, dealing higher damage over a short period of time.

2200062.text: Sometimes immobilizes a doll, stopping it from taking actions.
